short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the ChatGPT responses right next to your search engine results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See the ChatGPT responses right next to your search engine results. 

This extension allows you to view ChatGPT responses on the right-hand side or underneath your search engine results.

Supported Search Engines:

Google, Bing , Yahoo and some other search engines 


Features:

Includes support for the most popular search engines
Official OpenAI API (GPT-3)
Code highlight
Dark mode
Light mode
Feedback to improve the ChatGPT extension
Custom trigger mode,
Copy the text to the clipboard.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~FAQ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


What is Chat-GPT?
ChatGPT is an AI-powered language model developed by OpenAI. It is a type of Generative Pre-trained Transformer (GPT) model that has been trained on a massive amount of text data from the internet.
Is Chat GPT Extension free to use?
Yes , it is completely free.
Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
Yes, You would need OpenAI Account to use ChatGPT, You can create an account for free at chat.openai.com
How to make the Chat GPT Extension work for Opera Browser?
Enable "Allow access to search page results" in the extension management page
How to make the Chat GPT Extension work for Brave Browser?
Disable "Prevent sites from fingerprinting me based on my language preferences" in brave://settings/shields
Are you associated with Open-ai?
No, we're a start-up company that uses open ai API
